channel.title: Groups on KAUotic Hacking Club
channel.description: Recent content in Groups on KAUotic Hacking Club

item.title: Presentations
item.description: This group in the club schedules lectures and presentations. Anyone is welcome to present something, even topics not directly linked to hacking and security. Notable presentations in the past include people from Telia and Google.

item.title: CTF Dev
item.description: CTF stands for Capture The Flag and is a gamified way of learning cybersecurity. wikipedia This is a group of people in the club creating CTF hacking challenges of all difficulties. They are maintaining and developing the CTFd platform at ctf.kauotic.se.

item.title: CTF Team
item.description: CTF stands for Capture The Flag and is a gamified way of learning cybersecurity. wikipedia This is a group of people in the club playing CTF hacking games hosted by various organizations with the main goal being learning and cooperation. Previous competitions have been hosted by HackTheBox (HTB), Totalförsvarets forskningsinstitut (FOI), Försvarets Radioanstalt (FRA), Militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten (MUST) and Säkerhetspolisen (SÄPO).
